name: Red Stack Tech
description: Red Stack Tech is a specialised Oracle Platinum Partner and an established leader in Technology Service Management and Professional Services. Red Stack Tech is proud to be part of Data Intensity. Together we are one of the largest, independent service providers in the Oracle ecosystem. As a result of this union, our customers have access to a broad portfolio of data-driven business services, with core capabilities including Oracle Applications, Oracle Engineered Systems and Oracle Cloud.
